name: Auditor
description: All permissions of Monitor View and modify resources to administrative audit logging system Cannot modify sensitive resources or data outside auditing, can read any sensitive data

name: Operator
description: All permissions of Monitor Can modify the runtime state, e.g. reload or shutdown the server, pause/resume JMS destination, flush database connection pool. Does not have permission to modify persistent state.

name: Maintainer
description: All permissions of Operator Can modify the persistent state, e.g. deploy an application, setting up new data sources, add a JMS destination

name: Monitor
description: Has the fewest permissions Only read configuration and current runtime state No access to sensitive resources or data or audit logging resources

name: SuperUser
description: Has all the permissions Equivalent to administrator in previous versions

name: Administrator
description: All permissions of Maintainer View and modify sensitive data such as access control system No access to administrative audit logging system

name: Deployer
description: All permissions of Maintainer Permission is restricted to applications only, cannot make changes to container configuration

name: Deployer
description: All permissions of Maintainer Permission is restricted to applications only, cannot make changes to container configuration

name: Administrator
description: All permissions of Maintainer View and modify sensitive data such as access control system No access to administrative audit logging system

name: SuperUser
description: Has all the permissions Equivalent to administrator in previous versions.

name: Auditor
description: All permissions of Monitor View and modify resources to administrative audit logging system Cannot modify sensitive resources or data outside auditing, can read any sensitive data

name: Maintainer
description: All permissions of Operator Can modify the persistent state, e.g. deploy an application, setting up new data sources, add a JMS destination

name: Operator
description: All permissions of Monitor Can modify the runtime state, e.g. reload or shutdown the server, pause/resume JMS destination, flush database connection pool. Does not have permission to modify persistent state.

name: Monitor
description: Has the fewest permissions Only read configuration and current runtime state No access to sensitive resources or data or audit logging resources
